version_description:
- Compatible with iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
- Compatible with Apple Watch

- Fix crash bug when show scanning screen.
- Fix crash bug when scanned on iPad.
- Improve Italian localization.
- Improve German localization.
- Improve Russian localization.

Feature, Bug Fix
- Compatible with Apple Watch watchOS 2.
- Fix crash bug when scan QR Code from photo.
- Fix crash bug after sort list of created QR Codes.
- Fix crash bug when use camera torch with iOS 7.

Localize
- Add Portugal Portuguese localization.
- Add Brazilian Portuguese localization.
- Improve Italian localization.
- Improve Spanish localization.
- Improve German localization.
- Improve Traditional Chinese localization.
- Improve Simplified Chinese localization.
- Improve Russian localization.
- Improve French localization.
- Improve Vietnamese localization.

- Increase number of history and QR codes you can create.
- Improve Italian translation.
- Improve Russian translation.

- iPad compatible.
- Support Dynamic Type.
- Add vibration setting.
- Improve iOS 10 compatibility.
- Improve Italian translation.
- Improve French translation.
- Fix bug for create QR Code with contacts.
- Fix bugs and implement feature requests from user.
- Fix crash when long-press the list of scan results with iPad.

- Scan history can now be exported to CSV file.
- The number of scan history items has increased to 100.

- Fix crash bug in settings tab on iOS 8, iOS9.
- Improve iPhone X compatibility.
- Improve Italian translation.
- Improve Russian translation.
- Fix crash bug when save the QR code to the photo library in iOS 11.
- Fix error when loading QR codes on Apple Watch.

- Improve UI of creating QR code.
- Now possible to specify the correction level when creating a QR code.
- Fixed several language localization.

New Feature
- Supports dark mode on iOS 13 and iOS 14.

Bug fixes
- Fixed a bug that the photo library could not be displayed on iOS 11 and iOS 14.
- Fixed a bug that QR code cannot be created from contacts on iOS 9, iOS 10 and iOS 14.
- Fixed the problem that the error correction level selection button on the QR code creation screen was not displayed correctly on iOS 9 and iOS 10.
- Fixed the problem that the history list could not be attached to an email when sharing it as a CSV file on some OS versions.

Other corrections
- Fixed to stop the camera when moving to a screen other than the camera screen.
